title: Mary Earps signs for Paris Saint-Germain
snippet: Paris Saint-Germain are delighted to announce that Mary Earps has joined their women's team.

title: Mary Earps "gutted" as PSG crash out of the Champions League
snippet: Mary Earps (pictured at Manchester United) crashed out of the Champions League with Paris Saint-Germain (PEDRO PORRU / SPP) Mary Earps said she felt “down in the dumps” after her PSG side crashed out of the Women’s Champions League.

title: Mary Earps - Wikipedia
snippet: She and Paris Saint-Germain lost 5–2 on aggregate to Juventus in the 2024–25 UEFA Women's Champions League qualifying rounds. On 12 November 2025, Earps returned to Manchester United in the Champions League for the first time since her move, where they lost 2-1.

title: Mary Earps on life at PSG: ‘There was a lot of noise so it’s been nice to escape’ | Sport | The Guardian
snippet: That’s why I moved to PSG, to just try to improve and develop as a player, and that’s what I feel I’ve continued to do this year. It’s a mentality thing – I’ve used it in a positive way.

title: Mary Earps: PSG sign England goalkeeper on free transfer following Manchester United exit | Football News | Sky Sports
snippet: Paris Saint-Germain have signed Mary Earps on a free transfer following her Manchester United exit. Earps has signed a three-year deal with PSG after running down her United contract this summer.
